title: Drums of Fu Manchu. Vol. 1
creator_credit: Republic Pictures Corporation, William Witney and John English
brief_description: Volume one contains the first seven episodes of this horror/action movie serial. The story line has Fu Manchu (Harry Brandon) in search of the tomb that houses the legendary sceptre of Genghis Khan. His oldest nemesis Sir Nayland Smith (William Royle) stands in his way and creates an adventure that spans from Asia to America. “And with him, comes the thunder of his summons to death -“
